dict.acceptation: 超出的时间，额外的时间；加班；加时赛；加班费；
使历时过久；使（曝光等）超过时间；

sent.orig: A: Some companies want the interns to work overtime, while others do not have overtime available.
sent.trans: 一些公司要实习生去加班，其他公司不要求加班。

sent.orig: Now in overtime, also to many days this day, no dinner, no overtime, only endless pay.
sent.trans: 现在在加班，还要继续很多天这样的日子，没有晚餐，没有加班费，只有无止境的付出。

sent.orig: Would you mind working overtime at night?Certainly not. I often work overtime at night.
Trains paid carries on, but the training period like overtime does not regard as working overtime.
sent.trans: 培训带薪进行，但培训期间如超时不视作加班。

sent.orig: He has to work overtime every evening.
